result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in court with attorney Karl J. Kelz.  Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea agreement put into the record. Victim rights have been complied.   Plea of no contest to counts 1 and 2.  Plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; factual basis exists.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Court orders Count 1 - 8 months county jail with huber; court costs; DNA sample and DNA surcharge.  Count 2 - $100.00 fine plus court costs.   Sentence credit of 109 days.  Case Nos. 15CF10, 14CM76 and 14CF81 are dismissed and read in.  The fine and costs are to be paid at the rate of $25.00 a month beginning August 3, 2015.  - rt

records.addlTxt: Status conference at 03-03-2015 01:30 pm

Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in court, in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Mr. Ruiz indicates that he wants an attorney.  Court finds that there is good reason to waive the time limits for a preliminary hearing.   Court orders time limits for a preliminary hearing waived.   Mr. Ruiz was given a Petition and Order for Appointment of Counsel.  He is to immediately fill it out and return to the court.  - rt

Defendant Daniel Luis Ruiz in court, in custody.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Tlusty calls case. Court advised DE of charges, penalties, and right to counsel. Referred to SPD. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of DE. Pretrial conference scheduled for 2-05-15 at 3:30 p.m. State requested current bond to continue. So ordered by the Court. ap
*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.
arrest

Kristi Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Daniel L. Ruiz appeared in court, in custody.  Court finds probable cause for arrest without warrant based on the arrest header.  Attorney Tlusty requested a $500.00 cash bond; booking and no operation of a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Court orders bond as requested by Attorney Tlusty.  Notice of right to an attorney given to defendant.  Next court date is an initial appearance on January 27, 2015 at 1:00 pm.my.  Clerk is to begin bond revocation proceedings on defendant's other file.  - rt
